item.description:
Xen'drik Expeditions returns to Pandemonium Books & Games in a frantic pair of super-weekends!

Noon to 5 PM at the Dining Room table of Doooom - Well of Woe, Round 3 - Host to be announced

At last, the Well of Woe! But is there any way that four different factions can put aside their differences and work together> (All factions welcome.)

-

Noon to 5 PM in the Arena - Crimson Codex Adventure 3: Native Intelligence - Hosted by Jeff Squires (tentative)

The power of the Caldyn Fragments belongs to those who created it, the Crimson Codex. But not everyone sees it that way... (Crimson Codex characters only.)



We can take 6 players per session, plus we take 2 alternates, who get the space if a player cancels or doesn't show. Please sign up by sending email to rpga [AT] bloopwatch [DOT] org

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: XenEx Panic Weekend @ Pandemonium Books & Games
